snippet.title: Worlds Adrift Show - Episode 13 - Recording Vocals for the Soundtrack
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Worlds Adrift Show! Here we discuss all of the latest news and information surrounding Bossa Studios' new MMO title, Worlds Adrift. We'll also have behind-the-scenes features on the development, competitions and more!

This week we headed over to Improbable Studios to record Freja Frances performing Vocals for a future trailer.

Subscribe for the latest and leave a comment with your questions/suggestions!

Want to know more? Sign up for exclusive access to Worlds Adrift, to reserve your game name and to talk to the community on the forums at http://www.worldsadrift.com/register

Or head to our official subreddit at https://www.reddit.com/r/worldsadrift
